DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect single dose TrIP pulmonary function patient COPD
DOC.brief_title: Study Trospium Chloride Inhalation Powder ( TrIP ) Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Male female COPD patient age 40 80 year Smoking history least 10 pack year Not currently use ( able wash ) long act bronchodilator Candidate wait list surgery study Using longterm oxygen therapy Hospitalization COPD exacerbation
